backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three implemented features (story file numbering fix, race reference audit, GGFan name insertion) to their relevant source files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries of each frontend source file, describing their roles and key implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining light and dark mode CSS custom properties (OKLCH color tokens) for the app's design system.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell for the React app titled 'The EJ Files Countdown' that mounts the app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing navigation between the landing page, a 5-second loading screen, and five story pages, passing dynamically derived totalStories to each StoryPage.
frontend/src/components/CountdownTimer.t: Empty file placeholder for a countdown timer component.
frontend/src/components/StoryPage.tsx: Reusable story page component that renders a classified file header using dynamic totalStories prop, section-based content cards, and previous/next navigation buttons.
frontend/src/data/storyContent.ts: Defines the StoryContent interface and exports five classified-file story objects about EJ, with race mentioned only once and GGFan referenced twice across the narratives.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor via React Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) configurations.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdown.ts: Custom React hook that manages a 2-day 3-hour countdown timer, persisting the target date in localStorage under a versioned key and updating remaining time every second.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the ICP platform, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file with no implementation, noting that countdown functionality is client-side only and requires no backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind base/components/utilities and defines a deep-space dark theme using OKLCH CSS custom properties, plus fade/slide-in keyframe animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the root component wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with OKLCH-based color tokens, custom fonts, border radii, glow box shadows, and animation keyframes, plus typography and container-query plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking three fix requests: correcting dynamic file numbering display, limiting race mentions to once across stories, and adding 'GGFan' references at least twice in story content.
